ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have We not made the earth a flat carpet
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did We not make the earth a spreading,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have We not spread the earth like a bed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have We not made the earth as a place to rest
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did We not make the earth a bed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Have We not made the earth as a bed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have We not made the earth an even expanse?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have We not made the earth as a cradle
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have We not made the earth an expanse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have We not spread the earth like a bed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have We not made the earth an expanse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did We not make the earth a resting place?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Have We not made the earth as a wide expanse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Have We not made the earth as a bed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have We not made the earth as a cradle
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Did We not make the earth a cradle?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:6] Have We not made the earth a cradle, a bed, like a cradle,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then mentioned the blessings He bestowed upon them, saying: (Have We not made the earth an expanse) and a place to sleep,
